rules.equals: Is the attribute value equals with a rule value
rules.not_equals: Is the attribute value NOT equals with a rule value
rules.starts_with: Does the attribute value starts a the rule value
rules.ends_with: Does the attribute value ends with a rule value
rules.start_or_ends_with: Does the attribute value start or ends with a rule value
rules.contains: Does the attribute value contains in the rule values
rules.not_contains: Does the attribute value NOT contains in the rule values
rules.chained: Does the attribute value NOT contains in the rule values
rules.contains_files: Does files with the EXTENSIONS (rule values) exists

template.order: Integer number to adjust order of config execution. The smaller the earlier it will be executed >> default 5
template.operator: 'any' or 'all' rule values must be TRUE >> default: all

path.operator: 'any' or 'all' rules must be TRUE >> default: any

rule_to_apply: Values for the rule to check
rules.operator: 'any' or 'all' rule values must be TRUE >> default: any
rules.before_or_after: true if the values from app config should to be taken, otherwise false
before_or_after_values: If other values than in the app config should be used

name.operator: 'any' or 'all' rules must be TRUE >> default: any

rule_to_apply: Values for the rule to check
rules.operator: 'any' or 'all' rule values must be TRUE >> default: any
rules.before_or_after: true if the values from app config should to be taken, otherwise false
before_or_after_values: If other values than in the app config should be used
